name: Email Subject Line Generator
description: Template for generating engaging email subject lines
template:
Generate 5 engaging and high-converting email subject lines for a {{industry}} company. The email is about {{topic}} and is targeting {{audience}}. The tone should be {{tone}}.

Subject lines should be:
- Concise (under 50 characters)
- Engaging and curiosity-inducing
- Relevant to the target audience
- Not clickbait or spammy
- Aligned with the company's brand voice
